name: Roy Tang
text: ^ This. I'm also ambivalent about those radio shows where people call in and ask for help/legal advice, especially the ones where yung host tatawag pa sa concerned govt agency para ilakad yung concerns ni caller. On the one hand, they're helping people. On the other hand, people shouldn't need to go through such channels just to get stuff handled.
